name: Operation Heavy Rain
description:
Take command and lead your squad to victory on the battlefield.  In this voice recognition strategy game, you play as a military general, in charge of giving direct orders to your squad of infantry on the field. You view the battlefield through a satellite command terminal, showing your squads icon, health, and usable utility, as well as the icons of any enemies your squad encounters. 

This game requires a mic to give commands (built in or external).

WARNING : This games audio plays at different volumes depending on your computer. Please lower your volume before playing and then adjust to preference. This bug is currently being worked on.
